textBox.richText: A diminutive flower bud stunted by the elements Violent gusts rattle it’s stem, and fearsome tremors threaten its roots tucked and braced for bitter survival Storms thunder above the now withered flower Dust fills every crevice and crease Its petals slowly crinkle and turn brown When all hope seems lost for the frail flower A gentle shower eases its struggle Sunshine grants nutrients and energy The damp soil slowly, but surely nurtures the flower And finally glistening beads of morning dew perch themselves, Upon the pristine petals of a fully bloomed flower.
